duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide end-user support for desktops, laptops, tablets, and associated hardware peripherals.
Manage ticket queue and ensure timely resolution of end-user issues.
Coordinate with vendors and Level 3 support groups for service delivery enhancements and project maintenance.
Provide IT support for on-site and off-site events, disaster recovery, and emergency response activities.
Assist with ergonomic equipment and lift heavy equipment within the stockroom when necessary.
Maintain security and compliance related tasks such as access reviews, risk assessments, and controls verifications.

education_certification.credential: Technical Certification (Microsoft/HP/Dell) in a similar field is an added advantage.
